      • run

        public void run()
        Time thread is responsible for running system time and checking stop condition. One day in system is 0.5 seconds in real Every month system displays current date and invokes finance settlement. If system is not profitable for 3 months in a row simulation is ending and dramatic music appears!
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
